item.description:
EVENT CANCELED !!!

This event has been canceled due to rain. Am not deleting details in case it is rescheduled for the future, but the concert will not run this evening.

Tonight we won't be attending Pendragon's installment of the RI National Historical Societies "Concert under the Elms"

Check out Pendragon's website at: http://riverfolk.org/....

It's a lawn concert, so bring a blanket, something to eat/drink and well, bug spray:-). The cost of the concert is $8, and food and beverages are available for purchase. The concert doesn't get underway until 6:30, but allotted a 1/2 hour of settling time:-)

Check out details on the entire concert series as well as the location, etc at the RIHS website: http://www.rihs.org/c.... I've posted most of them as notes on our calender, and might make a couple more this season. If you want to join me, just drop me a line!

Rain has canceled this event for July 24th

For more details, contact Lisa
item.name: Celtic Music Concert, Providence RI---CANCELED DUE TO RAIN!!!!
